column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Don't take this review personal because I will admit I'm biased. I don't even like ramen but decided to eat here because I was outnumber by my friends. To start of our night
column2: they refused to seat us until our party was complete and we were missing one person. Working in the restaurant business
column3: I would've been more understanding if they were actually busy
column4: but it was not a full restaurant with plenty of tables opened.
